comment: Although you must sign a terms of use/service, tumblr users retain the rights over their creative content.

Tumblr is provided to users for free. Users accept a Terms of Service, including community guidelines and a privacy policy. Tumblr users retain ownership of content they create on the site: "Tumblr blogs have gone on to spawn books, films, albums, brands, and more. We're thrilled to offer our support as a platform for our creators, and we'd never claim to be entitled to royalties or reimbursement for the success of what you've created. It's your work, and we're proud to be a part (however small) of what you accomplish."  http://www.tumblr.com/policy/en/terms_of_service. Accessed 30 August 2012.
